user_query: I'm planning a corporate event and need to find a venue that can accommodate a large number of people. Please search for breweries that have a large capacity and provide their website URLs. Also, fetch some tips/reviews for recipe ID 3562 from Tasty.

TaskList.description: Search for breweries that can accommodate a large number of people and retrieve their website URLs.
Fetch tips and reviews for recipe ID 3562 from Tasty.
